snippet: President Dilma Rousseff and her pro-business challenger Aecio Neves are still running neck and neck ahead of the Oct. 26 runoff to Brazil's presidential election, a new poll showed on Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: Brazil's Rousseff and Neves Even Ahead of October 26 Runoff: Poll
headline.main: Brazil's Rousseff and Neves Even Ahead of October 26 Runoff: Poll

lead_paragraph: President Dilma Rousseff and her pro-business challenger Aecio Neves are still running neck and neck ahead of the Oct. 26 runoff to Brazil's presidential election, a new poll showed on Wednesday.
